snippet.title: Trail Mix - OUT NOW FOR FREE!!
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD FOR FREE: https://puzzsoft.itch.io/trail-mix
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/PuzzSoft
Trail Mix is a Local Co-op Puzzle Platformer focused on facilitating teamwork and communication between two players. It stars two camp counselors who must gather their lost campers and traverse the wilderness. Collected campers attach to the players and form strange shapes, which can be used to navigate the wilderness and solve challenging puzzles.

Trail Mix is a game developed by:
JohnLee Cooper, Michael Guattery, Marty Daniels, and Rachel Theil

With sound by:
Ryan Maxwell, Patrick Flattery, and Colman Xie
